titleStmt.title: A letter written by King James to his Holiness the Pope, as 'tis extracted out of the registers taken at Dublin.
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
Alexander VIII, Pope, 1610-1691.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Castle at Dublin, this 26. of November. MDCLXXXIX.
Appeal by King James II to the newly elected Pope to promote a truce among the warring Catholic rulers in Europe.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
